'''Sharian Korianthil''' was a windrider of [[House Korianthil]] in [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Sharian was the head of the isle's [[eagle]]-riders. He was known for his near-suicidal tactics, acrobatics maneuvers, and use of exotic weapons. Sharian was also known to indulge in sylvan celebrations, drinking contests, passionate affairs, and numerous brawls, especially against [[sun elves]].
document_data.Personality: Despite his reputation, Sharian was a powerful warrior loyal to Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]].
